'''Oneiromancy''' was a form of magic that utilized dreams.<ref>

Masters of '''oneiromancy''' were able to interpret dreams and thus reveal portents hidden in them.
document_data.Known Users: Oneiromancy was a specialty of the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Divination]].

Appendix.Further Reading:
* "In Dreams: The Lost Art of Oneiromancy", [[Dragon magazine 221|''Dragon'' #221]]
